definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: What is the function of ligase in DNA replication?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是連接酶的作用在脫氧核糖核酸複製的？

sentences.english: Different DNA polymerases and ligases are used to complete the separate pathways.
sentences.chinese: 不同的DNA聚合酶和連接酶被用來完成分離途徑。

sentences.english: Enzymes are attached to form a reporter complex.
sentences.chinese: 連接酶形成報道複合物。
